summary: Google Analytics 4 (GA4) tracks how users interact with ChurchCRM, providing insights into page views, user engagement, and feature usage.

sections.title: Getting Your GA4 Measurement ID
sections.content:
1. Go to Google Analytics (analytics.google.com)
2. Create a property or select an existing one
3. Go to Admin → Data Streams → Web
4. Copy the Measurement ID (starts with G-)

sections.title: What Gets Tracked
sections.content:
• Page views and navigation patterns
• Session duration and engagement
• User demographics (if enabled in GA4)
• Device and browser information

sections.title: Privacy Considerations
sections.content: Google Analytics collects anonymized usage data. No personal information from ChurchCRM records is sent to Google. Consider adding a privacy notice to your church's data policy.
